Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Mount Veeder
Wine Description: It is opaque purple in color with deeply perfumed aromas of blackberry, boysenberry, rum raisin, espresso and brown sugar. On the palate this wine shows layers of dense berry preserves, exotic cola and smoked meat flavors intermixed with tar and rich toast to create a compelling wine that lingers in the mouth for several minutes.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of French raspberry hard candy meld beautifully with the burnt sugar and toasted almond smells of toffee. Just underneath lies an intriguing resinous note of fresh rosemary a nod to the cool vintage. The mouth is lusciously rich and soft.

Name: Pinot Noir Reserve
Wine Description: It has fine aromatic blend of fully ripened raspberries and lightly roasted almonds –with the scent of roses always setting the tone; still a bit restrained. Somewhat powerful on the palate, also youthful, medium- to full-bodied, very hearty and surprisingly rich in tannins.Good for ageing.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has dense, deep, ripe aromas of black berry and black cherry-like fruit layered with caramel and toastiness from a nice mix of French Oak barrels.

Name: Le Clos Guillot Chinon
Wine Description: Bright violet. Complex aromas of black cherry, plum, spicecake and musky underbrush. Dense, sweet and tactile, this cabernet franc shows a sappy core of dark berry fruit with impressive energy.

Name: Bugialla Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Bright ruby red colour. On the nose notes of blackberries, leather, cherries and red currant with a touch of liquorice, graphite and tobacco. Sweet and persistent tannins.

Name: Il Garrulo Chianti Colli Senesi
Wine Description: A rich nose, soft, and juicy red fruit providing a long finish, light on the palate.

Name: Mercurey 1er Cru Clos des Myglands
Wine Description: The nose sets aromas of black and red fruits against a woody and smoky base. The same greedy, fruity flavours are found on the palate. This wine is well structured with beautiful volume and velvety tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Rich, lively flavors of succulent blackberry, current, and strawberry are wrapped in soft, smooth tannins.

Name: La Serra Barolo
Wine Description: It shows a garnet red color, lit by ruby reflections with slight orange note. The bouquet is ethereal , fresh, elegant and very persistent, with hints of violet, rose, licorice and sweet spices. Is long and intense aromatic persistence.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: It has ruby red color. Impressively complex, multi-layered nose characterised by dark red berry fruit and vanilla. Abundant notes of pungent pencil lead and tobacco leaf.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Displays expressive aromas of black cherry, red plum and pomegranate with a hint of toasty oak. Rich and juicy on the palate, the wine’s concentrated dark cherry, plum and blackcurrant flavors are supported by fine tannins and balanced acidity, leading to a long, fruitful finish showcasing cassis and toasty oak tones.

Name: Barolo La Serra
Wine Description: Dark, deep red Perfume : The olfato is important, austere, intact, with initial expression severe, but then rampant in notes more and more neat and bright Palate : Mora, berries, coffee beans, licorice, then purple , pulp of cherry and raspberry: The taste of ratings and leading man. Savory flavor, tanniti thick but precise, long finish.

Name: Dry Red No. 2
Wine Description: It has medium-bodied yet weighty & concentrated palate. This is no shrinking violet! Features a fresh, clean & detailed mouthfeel. Generous fruit plumpness, assertive tannins & crisp acidity are given additional volume by co-fermented Mataro & white varieties & support by juicy stalk tannins & crisp acidity are given to poise & length with fruit to flesh out over time.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Intense of deep garnet color and silken texture. The wine offers abundant aromas of ripe fruit including red currants, wild red berries, and black cherries.Focusing on the always-elegant Dijon clones, this grape is fruit-driven with a soft smokiness and sweet smell of night-bloom jasmine. The creamy texture and refreshing acidity create an incredibly pleasurable mouth feel that leads to a long and satisfying finish.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Ripe cherries and strawberries, fragrant with mocha and touch of oak. Palate has great grip, fruit less prominent and touch darker, cedar, earth, coffee and tobacco, ripe fulsome tannins and great acidity.

Name: Gevrey Chambertin
Wine Description: It has deep color, with a multi-faceted berry and red fruit bouquet, a full, tannic structure and mellow texture carry into a lasting finish.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Grand Cru Classé until 2012)
Winery: Château La Tour du Pin Figeac

Name: Sancerre Rouge
Wine Description: An elegant, fruity but substantial Pinot Noir with juicy red fruit flavours, complemented by subtle spicy vanilla hints. Delicious when chilled slightly.

Name: Sammarco
Wine Description: Sammarco is a very fresh wine with fine aromas of woodland undergrowth and a deep, intense colour. It is characterised by distinct aromas of ripe fruit and has a strong concentration of powerful tannins.

Name: Etna Guardiola Rosso
Wine Description: The sinew releases its tension just a bit, the tannins soften, the wine’s authority remains. Pork, steak, sausages, game, braised meats.

Name: Barolo Prapò
Wine Description: The tasting is garnet red with light orange reflections; The intense aroma of dried fruits, light vanilla, with blackcurrant undertones. In the mouth the entrance is warm, full and nice tannins but austere and wipes her mouth, leaving a persistent back-aromatic hints of the olfactory sensations.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: It has fresh and inviting nose with hints of red fruit, spicy notes of vanilla, cloves and licorice. Polished tannins and good structure well supported by acidity. Finale with a pleasant smell match and surprising persistence.

Name: Coleccion Jaime Rodriguez Granja Nuestra Senora de Remulleri
Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Intense ruby red colour with garnet highlights. Clean, sophisticated, intense and complex aroma, rich in evolved overtones, with hints of anise, ripe wild berries and a light touch of vanilla. Warm with supple tannins, great structure, good length and considerable aging capacity.

Name: Côte-Rôtie Madinière
Wine Description: Greedy and expressive wine. Basket of red and black fruit picked ripe, smoky notes related to shale wood and some spices (clove). Ample and balanced palate, velvety texture of tannins, roundness of the fruit, length of freshness.Red meat , duck confit Parmentier, potatoes, Jerusalem artichokes and truffles.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Colour is intense amber-red. The smell is balanced and pleasant, with plums, underbrush and minerals. The taste is wonderfully sweet on entry, then powerful with strong tannins in the middle palate and with a very long finish.

Name: Domaine du Docteur Rodgers Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Deep, concentrated and complete. The nose is ripe, powerful and imbued with cassis, bay leaf, cigar box and a trace of oak. The palate is full and balanced and the tannins are seamless. This is an imposing wine that will age gracefully for well into the next decade.

Name: A la Gloire de Mon Grand-Père Châteauneuf-du-Pape
Wine Description: With a good depth of plum and kirsch on the mid palate, the spicy finish follows through. From mostly old vine Grenache, 2% Cinsault was added in for good measure.

Name: Red C Red Blend
Wine Description: Highly vivacious character with ripe, round, cherry, berry and spice flavors couched in firm acidity and soft, supple tannins.

Name: Saint Cosme Côte-Rotie
Wine Description: On the bright purple, this wine with a very expressive bouquet exudes aromas of cassis and boysenberry, and attractive fl oral and spicy nuances that adorn its liveliness. Exquisite flavors of red and black fruits are then vigorously enhance the exoticism of its light fl oral presence and impressive sharpness.

Name: Pinot Noir Clone 115
Wine Description: The aromas are packed with dark, ripe cherries and blueberries, vanilla and oak. There are ripe cherries, blueberries and sweet vanilla flavors. Firm tannins provide structure and the finish lingers with cinnamon spice and dark fruit flavors.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Simply gorgeous red and black fruits,especially blueberries, raspberries, and hints of dried apricot.The mouth feel is so wonderfully plush, delicious, and expansive.

Name: Barolo Parussi
Wine Description: Appearance: Deep garnet red. Nose: ethereal and enveloping with intense and persistent notes of sweet spices, sandalwood, tobacco and leather. Taste: structured and powerful, highlights, in the first years of life, austerity remarkable that file with the passage of time. Tannins very thick and robust making it certainly lived. The long finish shows the character of Castiglione Falletto.

Name: The Montelena Estate Zinfandel
Wine Description: The Zinfandel shows beautiful ruby red color with medium density. The nose is rich with barrel spice and toast notes reminiscent of rustic bread fresh from a wood-fired oven along with bright red briar-berry, cedar, anise, and a hint of tobacco.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: It contain elegant and well balanced, powerful, but clean and smooth and a dynamic rising finale.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Scents of black cherry, plum, roasted chestnuts, and dark chocolate. Rich without being heavy. Balanced flavors of plum, vanilla and cherry-spice. Mature tannins finish lend a long and lingering finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: A brilliant magenta color and expressive aromas of raspberry, plum, chocolate, brown spice and black pepper introduce the 2012 Estate Cabernet. A mouth-watering, sweet entry leads to a full-bodied wine that delivers rich, dark mountain fruit and plush tannins. This vintage promises early enjoyment.

Name: Durell Hayfield Block Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Intensely rich core of red plum and black cherry with hints of clove, sweet tea, cola and earthiness. The palate is noteworthy for its great length and seamless integration of high-toned fruit and polished tannins.
